document_data.name: Jephford
document_data.deathnotes: one survivor in team; likely casualty
document_data.mainbody: [[Jephford]] was a soldier of [[Cormyr]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: He was a member of the [[Purple Dragons]], and a soldier.
document_data.History:
In the aftermath of the massacre at the [[Council of the Dragon]] of [[Cormyr]] in late [[Mirtul]] of the {{yearlink|1479}}, Jephford was part of a group including the [[War Wizard]] [[Glathra Barcantle]], Lord Warder [[Vainrence]], a Highknight named [[Eldur Hawkmantle]], Jephford himself, and three other Purple Dragons. Jephford was one of these Purple Dragons; after Glathra revealed they were seeking out the sages [[Orkrash]], [[Loagranboydar]], [[Garendor]], [[Argrant]], and [[Wyshbryn]], and that they were doing other tasks as well, Jephford blurted out she must be looking for nobles born with a talent for [[the Art]] so as to determine who was responsible for the [[blueflame ghost]] featuring in the massacre. Glathra all but confirmed his conclusion.

After the five sages were discovered slain, Vainrence cast a spell to determine how they were killed. A lurking contingency exploded the room in response. Only one of the Purple Dragons survived.
